short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool that allows you to save websites for later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keeps track of websites, Amazon store pages, LinkedIn profile pages, etc and text snippets in local storage for later access. Web links are clickable. (Note: pasted and/or hyperlinked texts will not function unless in complete URL format, i.e. "http://www.google.com.)

Update 0.002: Added button to clear the storage session. Activates when the app is reloaded.
Update 0.003: Added Functionality to add the current tab of the current window directly to the list.
Update 0.004: Improved the list display by showing clickable page titles, in place of illegible URLs.
Update 0.005: Modified the Clear Button to instantly work upon double-clicking. Modified colors and images for better branding. Changed the way the list is displayed, by adding both page title and URL to the list.
